import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; export default function Register() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '' }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData; // handles input values and sets data in formData based on type of input value const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (
